attributes.action: Conduct a full and impartial inquiry into the 'value for money' offered by the current national administration compared to other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The inquiry should focus on whether the current adaptation of democracy in operation in the UK is a drain on national resources or if it offers 'good value for money' to the tax-payer. This should include both Houses, focusing on Members’ salaries and expense claims. Particular attention should also be paid to the current method of salary increases for members and whether the current system should reflect the views of voters, thus offering productivity rewards to Members that perform well.
